intro_only_event_multi_ch0298_egg/6801_1:
So you want battle data of Pokémon that were
raised from Eggs?

Up till now, I’ve been asking everyone on Pasio
to help me with my Egg research. This is sure
to bring it all together!

So we’ll see what all those Pokémon raised with
tender loving care can do... I can’t wait!
